Rabbi Moshe Sherer works to free jewish hostages of 1970 hijacking

These notes by Rabbi Moshe Sherer are from the commemorative album put out by Agudath Israel of America in 1999 - Rabbi Moshe Sherer, his life and his legacy. They detail Rabbi Sherer's efforts to get the last Jewish hostages of the 1970 TWA hijacking ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dawson%27s_Field_hijackings) home in time for Rosh Hashana.

Although this is not a particularly old book, it is a commemorative album which seems somewhat hard to come by. In addition, I found the hour by hour narrative super fascinating.
